moves.1... d5 2. e3 Nc6: becarefull of e5...e4!. I have to stop it with f4
moves.4... Bxb1 5. Rxb1: exchanging good bishop against my knight is not a good idea.
moves.5... e6 6. Nf3 Nf6 7. Bd3 Bd6 8. O-O O-O: ready for fight. the goal is easy for me Ne5 is a nice place to stand
moves.9. Ne5 Bxe5 10. fxe5: whould be good there to go on e4, forcing me to exchange wiht the bishop, then i whould miss me a lot to attack plans
moves.10... Nd7: but not ! i'm lucky. sure he want t o play f5, but i wont let him !
moves.11. Qh5 g6: now f5 is dead. and i'm felling quite free to attack on king side
moves.12. Qh6 Ne7: Nf5 is coming, but i will play e4 to prevent it, then i will exchange knight againt LSB.
moves.13. e4 dxe4 14. Bxe4 Nf5 15. Bxf5 exf5: here we are, then the mate is coming soon....with Bg5!
moves.17... Nxf6 18. exf6: there is nothing to do, Qe3+ is a blunder, is met by h6xe3
moves.18... Qe3+: then he reseing !!! nice revenge isnt it ?
